attributes.action: Protect the Airline Industry against the new strain of Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The Government need to act on this matter of due urgency to protect jobs within the travel & tourism industry as this cannot be continued.
attributes.background: The Government need to act now as more and more countries are banning international travel from the UK amid fears of the new variant of COVID-19.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you care about the airline industry, but we're not sure what protections you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

Provide specific support for the UK Aviation industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553818
